mapper.sql: SELECT r.id, r.reply_type, r.comment_id, r.reply_id, r.content, r.reply_user_id, r.to_user_id, r.star, u.user_id, u.uuid, u.avatar, u.nick_name, u.sex, (select IF(count(1) > 0,1,0) from huomai_user_love where business_id = r.id and type = 3 and user_id = #{userId}) as love_flag FROM huomai_video_comment_reply r LEFT JOIN huomai_user u ON r.reply_user_id = u.user_id
